按照nuancheng的#486修复图层叠盖时获取点归属图层错误问题，修改zrender库的rectContain方法，问题得以解决。希望尽快将#486的改动合入master。@Ovilia
@sikazhang 非常感谢，我找人尽快给你 review~~

I have the same problem, most of the problems can be solved by calculating nameGap externally, but when yAxis is the category axis, and the categories are very large, echarts will perform display optimization according to `interval: 'auto'`, but we have no way to get which labels will eventually be displayed, which can cause problems with our final nameGap calculations.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13739947/65830665-1a1c6480-e2e4-11e9-8800-c5dbd2fd9ab2.png)

Problem comes from here
https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/util/number.js#L88

Great! There is one last thing I think needs to be changed.

The `axisType` is better to be renamed to `type` to be same with other axis components like [xAxis](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#xAxis.type)
Eastern European Summer Time

I was thinking about that when I defined the attribute. I went with axisType because radar is not dedicated to axis attributes (look at e.g. shape). In the future you might like to have multiple radar types and the obvious attribute of choice is taken already.  
For perfect consistency, one might need to introduce a radarAxis attribute in some future api-breaking release.
Got it. Thanks a lot for your help !

It seems to be a bug. But the reason may be `yAxis.max`.

Thanks for reply @yufeng04.

Before post thread, I tried your suggestion using xAxis.axisLabel.formatter. It works great but It doesn't work as I expect. When xAxis is set to type='time', time label is adjust to the range selected but if I set formatter, it doesn't adjust. 

For example, without formatter, if xAxis range is one day, time label only shows hour and minutes {HH:mm}. If range is one month, xAxis label shows date {MM-DD-YY}. However, if I set formatter, i.e. as {DD-MM-YY}, that is the format forever and range is indifferent. If I select one day range, format is again DD-MM-YY and not HH:mm as expected.

That's the reason I ask if there is any way to set format but adjust the "range format" at same time.

Thanks in advance.

@yufeng04 That's great. Unfortunately, that example has a completely different kind of data series. I'm talking about a chart with a graph-type series... I have clearly demonstrated that the event is not detected when applied to **the eCharts example which most closely resembles my project**. I have provided very clear instructions for replication.

那么在点击图例中的某个项之后，该项对应的那条线消失。再次点击，那条线又出现了，但这时 symbol 上的自定义Icon 就不见了。

Thanks for reporting. This seems to be a bug.
Yes, it currently doesn't support intelligent label formatting like giving a result of each day when passing `{MM-DD-YY}`. This feature needs further discussion.

@alex2wong I think the new design would help improve the user experience. We may set the icon and text to be "tile" after clicking "stack" so that it won't make confusion for old users.
We would appreciate it very much if you could make this PR. :)

I guess you're experiencing CORS issue in **file protocol**. You should make sure your page and  assets are served by http/https protocol and the client code request assets within the same domain. Otherwise, browser would restrict **cross-domain file** to be manipulated in canvas. 

Opening html file directly in browser can **not** serve assets by http protocol apparently.

you can simply use npm to install `http-server` to serve static files.
```
npm i http-server -g
cd YourFolder
http-server
```

I upload my folder to local server,then I solve this problem，thanks for your answer.
多谢老哥

Nevermind found the issue.  For anyone using react with typescript be aware:
`import ReactEcharts from 'echarts-for-react';` is not the same as this 
`import ReactEcharts from'echarts-for-react-typescript';`

@tz310200  After diving into source code around  https://github.com/alex2wong/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/util/model.js#L150 for a while.

I suppose this mappingToExists function has ability to merge new chart option to existing ones by series.id attr.  Which means you can specify the series of data you wanna put at bottom with the same id as the previous bottom one. then the new series would be rendered at its new order.

For instance, I provide a new forked codesandbox. 
https://codesandbox.io/s/echarts-series-stackid-g8dvh

You can see the new added series are rendered replacing the previous bottom one.. wish it help, thx
OMG, found duplicate fix in https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/pull/10670
attached doc reference : https://www.echartsjs.com/zh/option.html#series-line.id

节点会重新渲染 位置会移动
无法复现，如果还有问题的话，建议 reopen 一下这个 issue，并且提供额外的复现条件。

### 解决方式 
参考  https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/issues/5769  

### 设置 
- http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#dataZoom-inside.moveOnMouseMove
- http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#dataZoom-inside.zoomOnMouseWheel
- http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#dataZoom-inside.preventDefaultMouseMove

### 问题原因
起初以为是axisPointer的原因，后来发现是在移动的时候，出发了屏幕滚动，导致axisPointer无法移动问题。解决方式同上，也可以设置  event.preventDefault()
看起来像是 bug
Close due to problem fixed.

目的主要是出于防御措施，防止用户在非故意的情况下，意外地设置了一些属性，得到非期望的效果。
至于 `lineJoin` 可以作为一个 new-feature，@100pah 是否只需要在这个地方加上这一属性就行？
